data.text:
Filipino child actor (born 2007)Template:SHORTDESC:Filipino child actor (born 2007)

In this Philippine name, the middle name or maternal family name is Aquino and the surname or paternal family name is Yap.

<templatestyles src="Module:Infobox/styles.css"></templatestyles>

James "Bimby" Aquino Yap Jr. (<templatestyles src="Module:IPA/styles.css"></templatestyles>Tagalog: [ˈbimbɪ aˈkino jɐp]; born April 19, 2007) is a Filipino media personality and former child actor. He made his film debut in My Little Bossings (2013).[4]

Early life[]

Yap was born to television host and actress Kris Aquino and basketball player James Yap.

Personal life[]

He is currently home schooled.[5] In 2016, he experienced a concussion on the head.[6] In October 2020, Yap was reported to be 6 feet (1.8 m) tall and still growing, according to an Instagram post by his mother Kris Aquino.[7]

Career[]

Before Yap's movie debut in My Little Bossings, he first appeared in TV commercials and billboards together with his mother, such as Nido, San Marino Corned Tuna.
